Title: Zscaler
CO_managers: BofA Merrill Lynch/ Barclays/ Deutsche/ Credit Suisse/ UBS Securities/ Baird/ BTIG/ Needham, Stephens
Business: Our mission is to empower organizations to realize the full potential of the cloud and mobility by securely connecting users to applications from any device, anywhere. Zscaler was incorporated in 2007, during the early stages of cloud adoption and mobility, based on a vision that the internet would become the new corporate network as the cloud becomes the new data center.
